categories: Category:Battles of the invasion of the Tython system

nodes.text: During the Infinite Empire's invasion of the Tython system, the Je'daii Order foresaw that the forces of the Rakata species would strike at the planet Shikaakwa, and therefore countered Sub-Predor Ceh'let's attack with one of their one. Numerous Je'daii, led by General Daegen Lok, ambushed the Flesh Raiders sent to attack Ryo Fortress, the command center from which General Rajivari was commanding the joint forces of the Je'daii and the Settled Worlds. Losing over half of her forces, Ceh'let was forced to withdraw back to the Rakatan stronghold on Ska Gora.
